title: Best of The Herd for May 15, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for May 15, 2020
description:
The Saints need to stop acting like the NFL is against them

Colin defends Blake Snell for not wanting to take a risk

The longer we wait to bring college football players back the more we'll learn

Michael Jordan is a private person that had a public job


Guest: Andrew Whitworth, Rams Left Tackle

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
